Description: WASHBURN USA - SAMMY HAGAR - MAGNUM ROCKER MR450 GUITAR You are bidding on this awesome WASHBURN USA - SAMMY HAGAR - MAGNUM ROCKER MR450 GUITAR!!! This fine axe features an awesome transparent red flame top, a chambered semi-hollow body & Seymour Duncan humbuckers! Check out these awesome Features: Chambered Semi-Hollow Mahogany bodySignature F-holes on the bodyTransparent Red Flame TopRosewood fretboardPearl Dot inlaysSide Dot fret markersSet-Neck Construction24.75" scale neck22 Medium-Jumbo fretsSeymour Duncan Jazz Neck pickup in the neckSeymour Duncan Custom Custom pickup in the bridge3-Way pickup selector1 volume and 1 tone controlChrome hardwareFixed Bridge tailpieceGrover tuning machinesMade in the USA, Washburn Custom Shop craftsmanship & qualityOriginal Washburn hardshell case included This fine axe was made in 1997 & was among the best of the USA models Sammy Hagar made with Washburn. It has a stunning red flame top that looks a lot better in person & its semi-hollow body gives it an awesome & unique sound that voices perfectly with the Jazz Neck & Custom Custom, Seymour Duncan pickups. The neck is very smooth & plays like a dream. From the looks of the gorgeous rosewood fretboard & mahogany body, you can tell that the Washburn Custom Shop used top of the line wood in this guitar. If Sammy Hagar put his name on it, you know it has to be good! Please see the pictures for a description of this model guitar that I found in the July 1997 issue of Maximum Guitar magazine for more details on this great guitar. This fine guitar was lightly played & is in excellent condition in all respects. It is time for someone else to enjoy this awesome guitar. This awesome axe would make the perfect gift for that special Sammy Hagar fan or perhaps for yourself. Check my 100% positive feedback & bid with confidence. Shipping is $55 flat to the lower 48 USA. Shipping outside of the lower 48 USA is $105 plus any additional applicable fees. Please check out my other auctions for more cool stuff up for grabs. Thanks for looking & Bid to Win!!!
